name: Free Wi-Fi
description: Stay connected with high-speed internet throughout the room.

name: Air Conditioning
description: Maintain the perfect room temperature with air conditioning.

name: Mini Bar
description: A fully stocked mini bar with snacks and beverages.

description: Enjoy your favorite shows on a large flat-screen television.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Brew your own coffee with an in-room coffee maker.

name: Safe
description: Store your valuables in a secure in-room safe.

name: Bathtub
